description:
Jiji is one of the Seven Shadows. He was trapped inside a Rainbow Crystal and then reborn inside Grandpa Hino.
Zoycite extracted the crystal from him and turned him into Jiji, Champion of the Negaverse. The Sailor Senshi fought him, and Sailor Mars weakened him with a scroll attack, allowing Sailor Moon to heal him with Moon Healing Activation, killing Jiji in the process.
name: Jiji
